channel.title: Need help letting other players log onto server
channel.description: Someone help! :confused: I got server that lets me log in when I put on but doesn't let other players or let me put on serverstatus list. Someone please tell me why says it offline but its online I think because I'm on it! :| PS:Anyone who helps gets free mod on server if they want.

item.title: Need help letting other players log onto server
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

ok this is how you let people on your server =)
now first of all you have no-ip you say do you have a name for your server regeserted on no-ip and checked off on your no-ip on your desktop?
say like you have
servername.no-ip.biz
and you run your server click on no ip symbol and check the check box and it will update
now! people can get on you server with that ip but you have to use 0.0.0.0 for a reason i dont know
now to advertise your server go to serverstatus pages on moparscape and regester it
(make sure you have your server running before regestering or else wont work)
have fun i hope you progress in you coding =)

Read full topic
item.source: Need help letting other players log onto server
